projects.title: Chat Application
projects.description: Built real-time chat app with authentication, Socket.io messaging, responsive UI, scalable backend & DB optimization.
projects.fullDescription: A full-featured real-time chat application built using the MERN stack. Features include user authentication with JWT, real-time messaging using Socket.io, responsive design for all devices, and optimized database queries for scalability.

projects.title: Speed Detector System
projects.description: Arduino-based speed detection with real-time display, accurate sensor readings, and data logging for analysis.
projects.fullDescription: An IoT-based speed detection system using Arduino microcontroller. The system uses ultrasonic sensors to measure the speed of passing objects with high accuracy, displays results in real-time on an LCD, and logs data for further analysis.
